name: Interoute
tag_list: vpn, ethernet, mpls, vpls, cloud-computing, cloud, computing, ict, fibre, hosting
overview:
Interoute’s network is the largest in Europe today, offering unparalleled homogeneity, reach and capacity. Our products and services include bandwidth, virtual private networks, high speed internet access and transit, managed hosting, communications services and media streaming.

Our fibre optic network, consists of twelve rings connecting 93 cities in 22 countries across 55,000+ route kilometres of lit fibre and has the capacity to carry a petabit (a billion megabits per second) of traffic. We have also built metropolitan area networks (MANs) in 20 major European centres of business, including 59 data centres.

Interoute offers international solutions ranging from physical network based products to virtual cloud based services. Our solutions perform better because we own and manage the underlying physical network; Europe’s most advanced voice and data network encompassing 55,000 kms of lit fibre throughout Europe to Turkey, USA, Africa and the Middle East.
